Texts.Eng:
It's time to take down the ^orange;<bounty.gang.name>^reset; for good. We've picked up the trail of their leader, ^orange;<bounty.name>^reset;, <coordinate.preposition> <coordinate.name>.

Make sure you're well prepared for this one - their base is sure to be heavily fortified.

- REWARDS -
Capture: ^yellow;<captureRewards.money>^reset; pixels, +<captureRewards.rank> rank
Texts.Por:
É hora de derrubar a ^orange;<bounty.gang.name>^reset; para sempre. Pegamos o rastro do líder deles, ^orange;<bounty.name>^reset;, <coordinate.preposition> <coordinate.name>.

Certifique-se de que você está bem preparado para este - sua base certamente será fortemente fortificada.

- RECOMPENSAS -
Capturar: ^yellow;<captureRewards.money>^reset; pixels, +<captureRewards.rank> rank
